title: Ticket #7401: GCE gahp has issue with SSL after running for a "long time"
description:
After running for something on the order of two weeks, the GCE gahp suddenly stops being able to authenticate. Restarting it seems to fix the issue.

We were never able to reproduce or debug this issue. As a workaround we propose adding GCE_GAHP_LIFETIME, after which the gahp will exit and be restarted by the gridmanager.

This now happens by default every 24 hours. This will not affect the jobs themselves.
